detail_desc: Bolero in fine-knit cotton with a glittery button at the front and long sleeves.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and tapered legs.
Wide jumper in a soft, rib-knit cashmere blend with a double-layered turtle neck, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Dress in a soft weave with buttons at the back of the neck, a frill-trimmed yoke that continues over the shoulders and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in jersey crêpe with an opening at the top, a round neckline with pleats and a button at the front.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a small opening with a drawstring at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered, wrapover hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Shirt in a crisp cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam under the bust for added width.
Double-layered hat in a fine knit with a fabric appliqué on the turned-up hem.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Dress in textured, double-weave organic cotton with adjustable straps that have a decorative knot at the front, cross at the back and fasten with a button. Seam at the waist with elastication at the back. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton jersey, one with an all-over print.
Striped pyjamas in a soft cotton weave. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and buttoned cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
Jersey tube scarf. Length 40 cm, circumference approx. 56 cm.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and narrow hems.
Wide, ankle-length jeans in cotton denim. Elasticated waist with a tie belt, and side pockets.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long top in slub cotton jersey with a raw-edge neckline, visible seams at the back, twisted side seams, long sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with two handles at the top, a flap with a magnetic fastener and a zipped inner compartment. Imitation suede inside. Size 13x28x32 cm.

Sweatpants in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, side pockets, and covered elastication at the hems. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the sweatpants is recycled.
Dungaree dress in soft cotton corduroy with adjustable shoulder straps, press-studs at the sides and front and back pockets. Lined at the top.
Straight-cut, woven shirt in a relaxed style with a grandad collar, classic front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Lace bra with underwired, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, concealed zip down the back and long, wide puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Frill-trimmed seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt. Longer at the back. Partly lined.
Long-sleeved tops in lightweight organic cotton jersey, one patterned.
Narrow metal chain glasses chain decorated with plastic and metal shells. Plastic loop fasteners. Can also be worn as a necklace. Length approx. 80 cm.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with an interactive motif on the front.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Fully lined bikini top with laser-cut scalloped edges and wide shoulder straps.
Wide, short-sleeved top in marled cotton jersey with appliqués on the front.
Long-sleeved cardigan knitted in soft, garter-stitched cotton with buttons down the front, a hood with ears and ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend containing glittery threads with scalloped tops.
Short-sleeved, A-line dress in soft cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and hem. Unlined.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes and satin linings and insoles.
Long-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with dropped shoulders with a small flounce trim.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button at the waist, and skinny legs.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a top and pair of trousers in soft organic cotton velour. Top with long raglan sleeves and press-studs at the back of one shoulder. Twisted side seams and a ribbed jersey trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with elasticated ribbing at the waist and ribbed jersey trims at the hems.
Leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. One shoulder strap with a wide, flounced trim. No fasteners.
Dress in airy, patterned modal crêpe with a round neck, seam at the waist with a decorative bow at the front, and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.

Short dress in an airy rami weave with a deep V-neck and an opening at the front that fastens with narrow ties at the top. Deep opening at the back, dropped shoulders and balloon sleeves with buttons at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and a fitted skirt with narrow elastication and gathers at the front. Lined.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Dress in textured, shimmering metallic jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, short butterfly sleeves, a seam at the top and a flared skirt.
Joggers in slightly stretchy cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side and back pockets and slim legs with ribbed hems.

Short, wide dress in an airy weave with a collar and V-neck. Decorative gathers along the shoulder seams, a yoke at the back, long puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a gathered seam at the waist. Lined with a V-neck underdress that has narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Short, boxy-style top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Smocking at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Mules with open toes, leather linings and insoles, and covered heels approx. 2.5 cm.
Fine-knit trainers with an elasticated top edge and grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh insoles.

Medium-coverage underwired bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Sleeveless dress in sturdy, patterned fabric with a visible zip at the back, gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt.
Jumper in a rib-knit cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxy top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed funnel collar with a drawstring at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with quilted sections on the knees.
Loafers in soft imitation leather with a moccasin seam at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a round neck and long sleeves. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Polo-neck jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Set with a pair of joggers and a top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated, ribbed waistband, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Short, fitted dress with a V-neck and long sleeves in jersey made from a viscose blend with a crimped effect. Partly lined.
Nightdress in soft, printed cotton jersey with long sleeves and a rounded hem.

Shorter-style blouse in woven fabric with a small, gathered stand-up collar, an opening at the back and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Seam with wide, gathered ties at the hem that fasten at the back. Unlined.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. High slit in one side.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Fully lined bikini. Top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, two rows of flounces, a small metal decoration at the front and a plastic fastener at the back. Matching bikini bottoms.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly and button. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles.

Soft, non-wired, ribbed jersey bra tops that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Spaghetti shoulder straps. No fasteners. The tops are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Short, gently fitted dress in satin with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip at the back of the neck, shoulder pads and long sleeves. Unlined.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cardboard photo booth masks in various designs with a plastic stick.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Wide-fitting top with short dolman sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Leggings in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum movement with an all-over print, elasticated waist and fake front pockets.
Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.

Short dress in lace with a skirt in a pleated weave. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip at the back and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with an overlocked hem. Partly lined.
Double-breasted coat in soft, felted fabric containing some wool with notch lapels and flap front pockets. Long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single, high-cut back vent. Lined.
Hair accessories in metal decorated with sparkly glass stones. One wide hair clip and one hair grip with pendants. Length 4.5 cm and 6 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Large scarf in a soft, patterned weave with fringes on the short sides.
Ankle-length pull on-trousers in a patterned viscose weave. High waist with wide elastication at the back and pleats at the front, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Treggings in stretch cotton corduroy with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
